report.title: List of taxa for the ABLE app
report.description: A list of distinct taxa with names.
report.query: select #columns# from cache_samples_functional s join surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id and su.deleted=false left join cache_occurrences_functional o on o.sample_id=s.id or o.parent_sample_id=s.id left join cache_taxa_Taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id #joins# where s.website_id in (#website_ids#) and s.parent_sample_id is null and s.created_by_id=#user_id#

param.name: sq_size
param.description: Specify either 1000, 2000 or 10000 for the grid square resolution as 1km, 2km or 10km grid

joins.join: JOIN map_squares msq on msq.id=s.map_sq_1km_id and msq.size=1000
JOIN map_squares msq on msq.id=s.map_sq_2km_id and msq.size=2000
JOIN map_squares msq on msq.id=s.map_sq_10km_id and msq.size=10000

param.name: max_sq_size
param.description: Specify either 1000, 2000 or 10000 for the max square size to show if low precision grid refs in dataset

joins.join: JOIN map_squares msq on msq.id=s.map_sq_10km_id and msq.size=10000

param.name: bounds
param.description: Well known text for the bounding box to load

column.name: geom
column.sql: st_astext(case when msq.size > #sq_size# then s.public_geom else msq.geom end)
